marklogic.body:
Options and veteran contracts are getting in the way of young talent making the roster. Wheeler vs Hagadone and Canzler vs Cunningham or Spilbourghs. We will see this be a factor in the last bullpen Spot as well. Too bad cause by the time guys are recalled, that should have made the opening day roster, probably looking at 10 games behind the Tigers. Didn't add depth, just a lot of below average players with contract issues.
**note: Hafner needs to go, it's well overdue. Love the guy but he hasn't been the same for years now and compare production of Ubaldo to Pomerenz and White by July.....not going to be happy if you do.
